learning_outcomes.description: Understand the theory for the evolution of complex traits by natural selection, genetic drift and mutation
Apply the genetic concepts of trade-offs and pleiotropy to the evolution of life histories
Apply approaches for measuring natural selection on phenotypic traits
Critically assess the evolutionary genetics literature
Analyse human disease and trait mapping datasets and draw evolutionary inferences from them
Understand theories for the maintenance of genetic variation in complex traits and how to test them.
Perform a non-model system genome-wide association study
Design experiments to map complex traits

assessments.due_date:
28/08/2024

This exam will take place during the scheduled Workshop in Week 6
assessments.task_description:
This exam will consist of a 5 minute reading time plus 60 minutes exam time.

Questions will require short written answers, and cover content up to and including week 5.
assessments.submission_guidelines: You may be able to defer this exam.
assessments.deferral_or_extension: You may be able to defer this exam.
assessments.late_submission: A penalty of 10% of the maximum possible mark will be deducted per 24 hours from time submission is due for up to 7 days. After 7 days, you will receive a mark of 0.
assessments.additional_info: You may be able to defer this exam.

assessments.task_description: This short report will assess the data analysis and interpretation skills you develop over the first 8 weeks of the course, alongside your ability to understand and interpret the primary literature. Further details will be provided during the course.
assessments.deferral_or_extension: You may be able to apply for an extension.
assessments.late_submission: A penalty of 10% of the maximum possible mark will be deducted per 24 hours from time submission is due for up to 7 days. After 7 days, you will receive a mark of 0.
assessments.additional_info: You may be able to apply for an extension.

assessments.task_description: This will be an on-campus, closed-book, invigilated examination.
assessments.submission_guidelines: You may be able to defer this exam.
